RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer Class

Definition

Expose RibbonGallery types to UI Automation.

In this Article

public class RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider

A RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer for the specified item.

GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

Gets the control type for the RibbonGallery that is associated with this RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

protected override System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType GetAutomationControlTypeCore ();
Returns
AutomationControlType

The AutomationControlType enumeration value.

GetChildrenCore()

Gets the collection of child elements of the RibbonGallery that is associated with this RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*.

Returns
List<AutomationPeer>

The collection of child elements of the RibbonGallery that is associated with this RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer.

GetClassNameCore()

Gets the class name of the RibbonGallery that is associated with this RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

protected override string GetClassNameCore ();
Returns
String

"RibbonGallery" in all cases.

GetHelpTextCore()

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the control RibbonGallery that is associated with this RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*.

protected override string GetHelpTextCore ();
Returns
String

The text that describes the functionality of the control RibbonGallery that is associated with this RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer.

GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the RibbonGallery that is associated with the RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer.

public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);
Parameters
patternInterface
PatternInterface

A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

Returns
Object

An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, or PatternInterface value; otherwise, null.

Explicit Interface Implementations

ISelectionProvider.CanSelectMultiple

Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.

bool System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider.CanSelectMultiple { get; }
Returns
Boolean

false in all cases.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.GetSelection()

Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.

System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] ISelectionProvider.GetSelection ();
Returns
IRawElementProviderSimple[]

An AutomationPeer for each child element that is selected.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.IsSelectionRequired

Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.

bool System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider.IsSelectionRequired { get; }
Returns
Boolean

false in all cases.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.
